statements.statement: with temp as(select ID, OrderID, NewOrderID, CreateDate, row_number() over(order by ID desc) as row from WfsOrderBankFQPay with(nolock) where 1=1 #if($OrderID !='') and OrderID=@OrderID #end #if($CreateDate !='') and CreateDate >= @CreateDate and CreateDate <= DATEADD(DAY,1,@CreateDate) #end)select * from temp where row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize

SELECT Count(1) FROM WfsBankFQPay AS a with (nolock) WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WfsBankFQPay with (nolock) WHERE a.BankFQOrderNo = BankFQOrderNo AND a.ShangOrderNo = ShangOrderNo AND PayDate > a.PayDate AND BankFQOrderNo != '' AND RetureData != '' AND [Signature] != '' AND PostData IS NULL ) AND BankFQOrderNo != '' AND RetureData != '' AND [Signature] != '' AND PostData = '' AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM WfsOrderBankFQPay with (nolock) WHERE OrderID=a.ShangOrderNo AND NewOrderID=a.BankFQOrderNo) #if($OrderNo!='') AND a.ShangOrderNo=@OrderNo #end #if($PayDate!='') AND a.PayDate >= @PayDate and a.PayDate <= DATEADD(DAY,1,@PayDate) #end

SELECT #if($TopNum==0) BankFQInfoNo , ShangOrderNo , BankFQOrderNo , Period , AmountSend , PayDate , RetureData #elseif($TopNum==1) Count(1) #end FROM WfsBankFQPay (nolock) a WHERE BankFQOrderNo != '' AND RetureData != '' AND [Signature] != '' AND PostData = '' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WfsOrderBankFQPay (nolock) WHERE OrderID = a.ShangOrderNo AND NewOrderID = a.BankFQOrderNo ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WfsBankFQPay (nolock) WHERE BankFQOrderNo != '' AND RetureData != '' AND [Signature] != '' AND PostData = '' AND a.ShangOrderNo = ShangOrderNo AND PayDate > a.PayDate ) #if($OrderNo!='') AND a.ShangOrderNo=@OrderNo #end #if($PayDate!='') AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),a.PayDate,23) >= CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),@PayDate,23) #end #if($EndPayDate!='') AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),a.PayDate,23) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),@EndPayDate,23) #end
